channel.title: Docket EPA-HQ-OAR-2021-0668 Comments
channel.description: Public comments on regulations.gov docket EPA-HQ-OAR-2021-0668: Federal Implementation Plan Addressing Regional Ozone Transport for the 2015 Primary Ozone National Ambient Air Quality Standard

item.title: 13 New Comments on Docket EPA-HQ-OAR-2021-0668 on 2023-11-14
item.description:
On 2023-11-14, 13 new public comments were posted for docket EPA-HQ-OAR-2021-0668 (Federal Implementation Plan Addressing Regional Ozone Transport for the 2015 Primary Ozone National Ambient Air Quality Standard).

13 New Comments

  1. Comment submitted by Ozone Transport Commission (OTC)
  2. Comment submitted by Power Generators Air Coalition (PGen)
  3. Comment submitted by Alabama Power Company and PowerSouth Energy Cooperative
  4. Comment submitted by Tennessee Valley Authority (TVA)
  5. Comment submitted by Clean Air Task Force, Earthjustice, Environmental Defense Fund, and Sierra Club
  6. Comment submitted by Interstate Natural Gas Association of America (INGAA)
  7. Comment submitted by PacifiCorp
  8. Comment submitted by Wisconsin Department of Natural Resources (WDNR)
  9. Comment submitted by Pennsylvania Department of Environmental Protection.
  10. Comment submitted by Teona Mosley
  11. Comment submitted by American Forest & Paper Association, Inc., et al.
  12. Comment submitted by Ohio EPA
  13. Comment submitted by Alabama Department of Environmental Management
